catalog_script_client.name: OnChange - Check Parent Account

sys_update_version.name: catalog_script_client_fa4888961ba349505b1b411acd4bcb03
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Other Customer Service Requests">97e2cf85db44c19001eafad3f39619d2</cat_item><cat_variable>IO:cae6859c47be8910b0ce8b42e36d4340</cat_variable><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>OnChange - Check Parent Account</name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading) {
   if (isLoading || newValue == '') {
      return;
   }

	var cur_account = g_form.getValue('account');
	
    var ga = new GlideAjax('Parent_Account');
	ga.addParam('sysparm_name', 'getParentAccount');
	ga.addParam('sysparm_account', cur_account);
    ga.getXML(getResponse);

    function getResponse(response) {
        var answer = response.responseXML.documentElement.getAttribute('answer');
		
		var str = JSON.parse(answer);

		g_form.setValue('account_parent',str.parentcompanyId,str.parentcompanyName); 

	//	account_parent = str.parentcompanyName;       
	//	g_form.addInfoMessage(account_parent);
    }
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>cocbom0</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-05-20 19:45:46</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>fa4888961ba349505b1b411acd4bcb03</sys_id><sys_mod_count>11</sys_mod_count><sys_name>OnChange - Check Parent Account</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Support case" source="x_liisa_support_ca">80d47c06dba7f05001eafad3f3961926</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Support case">80d47c06dba7f05001eafad3f3961926</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_fa4888961ba349505b1b411acd4bcb03</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-04-06 14:48:55</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>
